name: Parking Master Multiplayer 2
description:
Finally, Parking Master Multiplayer 2 is here!

All in one: Multiplayer, open-world, next-gen graphics and real car parking experience. Choose your character, get your car and start playing with your friends!

This is not an ordinary car parking game. We have improved the game Parking Master: Multiplayer according to your wishes and we provide real car driving experience along with parking, racing, drifting, role playing and more.

HUGE MAP, DIFFERENT LOCATIONS
Car driving experience in cities, highways, mountains and more. Explore new areas and complete the missions around the map.

OPEN WORLD MULTIPLAYER
More than just parking! Play with your friends in the open-world multiplayer mode. Show your driving skills, race with your friends and drift in the streets.

NEXT-GEN REAL GRAPHICS
The graphics quality of this game is more than you expect from a mobile car game. Real physics, interior views and brand new cars. Experience real car parking just like in the real world.

SEVERAL CARS AND VEHICLES
There are more than 120 cars you can drive along with bus, truck, ambulance, fire truck, police car, taxi, school bus etc. There are classics, supersports, pickups, tuned cars and more. Choose your vehicle and start playing freely.

CUSTOMIZATIONS, TUNING AND UPGRADES
Lots of customization options are waiting for you.
You can upgrade the engine, brakes, gearbox, exhaust and drivetrain!
Hear the realistic engine sounds and boost your car to another level with tuning!

PARKING MISSIONS
There are more than 150 levels available for you to improve your car parking skills. Play with different vehicles and complete the missions in the given time, and become a parking master! This car parking simulator will take your driving skills to another level.

CAR TRADING
You can buy & sell cars in the multiplayer mode!

RACING
Race with other players in the multiplayer mode and show them who is the boss. Don’t forget, you should upgrade your car before racing!

ROLE PLAYING
With different characters, vehicles and missions available, you can role play with other players in the open-world mode.

EVENTS
There are several events in the singleplayer mode: Time Trial, Drift and Parkour. Play those events, get your rewards and keep exploring to find secret chests around the map!

Play this Car Parking Multiplayer Game and enjoy driving! Completely free!
publishers: SPEKTRA GAMES BILISIM MEDYA YAZILIM REKLAM PAZ ITH IHR SAN VE TIC LTD STI
